title: How to Make an Apple Bundt Cake

steps.headline: Brush or spread vegetable oil a bundt pan.
Add the apples, sugar and cinnamon to a medium mixing bowl.
Add the sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, orange juice, orange zest and vanilla to a large mixing bowl.
Add the flour to the egg mixture and mix to blend.
Spoon 1/2 of the batter into the prepared bundt pan.
Spread half the apple mixture over the cake batter.
Spoon remaining cake batter over apple mixture.
Spoon remaining apple mixture over cake batter.
Bake cake for about 1 1/2 hours or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool cake in bundt pan for 15 minutes.
Loosen the cake edges and turn the cake out onto a wire baking rack to cool.
Dust the cake with powdered sugar.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Brush or spread vegetable oil a bundt pan. Flour the pan. Add the apples, sugar and cinnamon to a medium mixing bowl.  Add the sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, orange juice, orange zest and vanilla to a large mixing bowl. Whisk to blend. Add the flour to the egg mixture and mix to blend.  Spoon 1/2 of the batter into the prepared bundt pan.  Spread half the apple mixture over the cake batter.  Spoon remaining cake batter over apple mixture.  Spoon remaining apple mixture over cake batter.  Top with remaining cake batter.  Bake cake for about 1 1/2 hours or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.  Cool cake in bundt pan for 15 minutes.  Loosen the cake edges and turn the cake out onto a wire baking rack to cool.  Dust the cake with powdered sugar.  Slice cake and serve.
